mapper.insert: insert into `sys_quartz_job` (job_id,job_name, job_group, job_status, audit_status, cron_expression, quartz_class, description) values (#{jobId},#{jobName}, #{jobGroup}, #{jobStatus}, #{auditStatus}, #{cronExpression}, #{quartzClass},#{description})
mapper.update: update `sys_quartz_job` set job_name = #{jobName}, job_group = #{jobGroup}, job_status = #{jobStatus}, audit_status = #{auditStatus}, cron_expression = #{cronExpression}, quartz_class = #{quartzClass}, description = #{description}, where job_id = #{jobId}
mapper.select: select job_id,job_name, job_group, job_status, audit_status, cron_expression, quartz_class, description from `sys_quartz_job` where job_id = #{jobId}
select job_id,job_name, job_group, job_status, audit_status, cron_expression, quartz_class, description from `sys_quartz_job`
